line.comment: * Sector view from the Sectors section.

line.text: 'You cannot terraform planets at this time.'
'Declaring a permanent war with another faction is irreversible. Are you sure?'
'Transfer impossible: the faction does not have an Outpost'
'Declaring a permanent war will give you 1 maximum perk in each of your Outpost. It cannot be undone.'
'You are in permanent war with that faction.'
'Your reputation with that faction is too low.'
'Killing a Kha'ak Hive Queen also grants a point.'
'This faction is missing the following strategic resource: '
' from your Interorbital storage to the '
'You don't have the required resource in your Interorbital storage.'
'This faction does not need any resource.'
'This faction does not need any resource.'
'Providing a strategic resource to a faction in need reduces the cost of the next '
'You can only transfer such resources if you first have them inside your Interorbital storage (Logistics->Stock).'

line.comment: * skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsMonitored' : objectOrSector=$sector race=[Player]

line.text: 'Reduced maintenance of freighters built from this sector (retroactive)'
'Increased loot chance and enabled Xenon loot'
'Reduced maintenance of M7s built from this sector (retroactive)'
'Reduced maintenance of M2s built from this sector (retroactive)'
'Reduced maintenance of fighters built from this sector (retroactive)'
'As Independents, you automatically claim a sector when you destroy a station'
'You can conquer an empty sector by building any station from a TL'
'You can only terraform planets in sectors you own.'
'Terraforming a planet is a dangerous process. Do you want to continue?'

Declaring a permanent war with another faction is irreversible. Are you sure?

You are in permanent war with that faction.
Your reputation with that faction is too low.

from your Interorbital storage to the

You can only transfer such resources if you first have them inside your Interorbital storage (Logistics->Stock).
